short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds some useful shortcuts to SEO related tools on tamethebots.com

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Adds some menu options to chrome's right click menu to test the page you're viewing  in many of the tools found at tamethebots.com, no more copying the URL!

Tools Include:

View Core Web Vitals (CWV) History
-----------------------------
See the Chrome User Experience Report (CrUX) history data charted out, and download the metrics as csv files. Including Largest Contentful Paint, Cumulative Layout Shift, Interaction to Next Paint and more.

Blocked by robots.txt
-----------------------------------
Use the open-sourced Google robots.txt parser to test if the URL is blocked by robots.txt rules.

Fetch & Render
------------------------
Simulates Googlebot's web rendering service test from the UK or USA, and optionally runs a lighthouse test.

Test Code Coverage
--------------------------------
Find unused CSS and JavaScript on the current page.

Valid Favicon for Google Search
--------------------------------------------------
Test the site to see if it has favicons specified that match the Google guidelines.

-----------
Bonus
-----------
Search Console Performance (opens GSC):
Opens Google's Search Console's performance report, filtered to the URL (you'll need to have the URL-prefix property verified).

---------------------
Version 0.0.4
---------------------
Menu now only shows on http or https pages, and gets out of the way on things like new tabs, chrome settings pages etc.

---------------------
Version 0.0.3
---------------------
Fixed a bug that sometimes undefined was passed to the tools instead of the current URL you're looking at.

---------------------
Version 0.0.2
---------------------
adds schema and metadata comparison between mobile and desktop versions of a page.
